text:
MIDWEST PROGRAM ON AIRBORNE TELEVISION INSTRUCTION
Mr. W. G. Harley
-2-
May 5, 1961
I'd like to again say, what I am sure you know, that I approach your return
to Wisconsin with mixed feelings. It is going to be nice having you back
so close and pulling in harness at the operations level again but we will
certainly miss your strong hand in Washington.
SIncerely,
/
James S. Miles
Director
Program Service and
Distribution Division
JSM:cb
